alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Harrison; Mills; Monona; Montgomery; Page; Pottawattamie; Shelby (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 17 at 3:22AM CST until January 19 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THURSDAY TO NOON CST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and west central Iowa and east central, northeast, and southeast Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM Thursday to noon CST Friday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Friday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Keep pets indoors as much as possible. Wrap pipes with insulation and seal windows to avoid loss of heat from your home. Keep a slow steady stream of water running from indoor faucets, and open cabinet doors to allow warm air to circulate around inside pipes.

area.areaDesc: Fremont; Harrison; Mills; Monona; Montgomery; Page; Pottawattamie; Shelby
